priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Non-system Reason for PCI Delay Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101855

self.title: CDISC SDTM Non-system Reason for PCI Delay Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist that contains reasons for non-system PCI delay.
name: Non-system Reason for PCI Delay
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Non-system Reason for PCI Delay Terminology

terms.definition: Cardiac arrest which occurs before a percutaneous coronary intervention can take place.
terms.preferredTerm: Cardiac Arrest Prior to Percutaneous Coronary Intervention

terms.definition: Access to the subject's vasculature is troublesome or formidable.
Placement of intracoronary devices across the coronary stenosis is troublesome or formidable.
terms.preferredTerm: Difficulty Crossing Culprit Lesion During Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
terms.submissionValue: DIFFICULTY CROSSING THE CULPRIT LESION DURING THE PCI PROCEDURE

terms.definition: Endotracheal intubation which occurs before a percutaneous coronary intervention can take place.
terms.preferredTerm: Endotracheal Intubation before Percutaneous Coronary Intervention

terms.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned. (NCI)
The subject has not provided consent in a timely manner for the procedure to take place.
